# UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.anchor

**Case**

Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to an anchor point.

## Declaration

```swift
case anchor
```

## Constants

- **UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.items**: Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to another dynamic item.

items.description: Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to another dynamic item.
items.name: UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.items
